long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Phần mềm tự động Shopee InEcom

Tool for automation marketing for Shopee & Tiktok - Ecommerce Marketplace

1. Automation Affiliate
- Auto fetch data KOL/KOC from shopee.vn and tiktok.com
- Auto invite KOL/KOC join affiliate campaign
- Auto send direct message from shopee and tiktok to KOL/KOC

2. Automation Marketing
- Auto fetch perfomance data from shopee.vn and tiktok.com
- Auto fetch ads data from  shopee.vn and tiktok.com
- Auto start flash sale slot for shopee.vn
